mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, nickname, phone, pwd, email, address1, address2, address3) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3});
mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id = #{id};
select count(nickname) from member where nickname = #{nickname};
select count(email) from member where email = #{email};
